Ingredients.3: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined

Ingredients.4: 1 pound scallops, rinsed and patted dry

Ingredients.5: 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained and flaked

Ingredients.6: 1 (12 ounce) can water packed tuna, drained and flaked

Ingredients.8: 1 tablespoon seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay™

Ingredients.11: 0.5 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet and add onions, stirring until translucent, about 7 minutes. Add shrimp, scallops, crab meat and tuna. Cook until shrimp are pink and the scallops are opaque, 8 to 10 minutes. Season with salt, pepper, and Old Bay Seasoning. Remove from heat.

Directions.2: Whisk together the mayonnaise, mustard, garlic powder, oregano, turmeric and sugar in a large bowl. Mix in the bell pepper, celery and chopped eggs.

Directions.3: Add seafood and toss until evenly combined. Garnish with eggs slices and sprinkle with paprika.

Directions.4: Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours or overnight before serving to let flavors blend.
